description: A React functional component named 'NoteEditor' that provides a user interface for editing a note with title and content fields, handling auto-save on blur events, and rendering conditionally based on the presence of a note prop.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: React functional component for editing notes with internal state for title and content, side-effects to synchronize with prop changes, and handlers for saving changes.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Function that invokes the onChange callback with the current title and content when the user blurs the input or textarea.
